mapper.sql: id, name, description, fictionCount, chapterCount, commentCount, restricted, fictionLocked, chapterLocked, commentLocked, hided, deleted, createTime
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from category
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into category (id, name, description, fictionCount, chapterCount, commentCount, restricted, fictionLocked, chapterLocked, commentLocked, hided, deleted, createTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fictionCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chapterCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{restricted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fictionLocked,jdbcType=BIT}, #{chapterLocked,jdbcType=BIT}, #{commentLocked,jdbcType=BIT}, #{hided,jdbcType=BIT}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update category
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fictionCount = #{record.fictionCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
chapterCount = #{record.chapterCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
commentCount = #{record.commentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
